name: Lacuna (bitDecay Games)
description:
Falling flat on your face, you wake to a chatty miner giving you a quick explanation of what you need to do. No time to wait around! Start exploring and see if you can escape the oddly shifting caverns.

Controls: 

- Move - Arrow keys

- Attack/Interact - Z

Art: Erik Meredith

Music Composition and SFX: Tanner Moore

Programming: Logan Moore and Tanner Moore

12/3/2020 - Fixed critical bug where the Matter Converter would sometimes get stuck in a non-operational state while in the mines.
